text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, the Mayor shall provide the owner with written notice of the District's intent to impose a penalty for a violation of §§ 47-859.01 through 47-859.05 or to disallow the tax abatement thereunder. The Mayor shall give the owner at least 30 days after the date of the notice to file an appeal and request a hearing before the Office of Administrative Hearings, which shall hear the appeal subject to the notice and hearing provisions of subchapter I of Chapter 18 of Title 2, and the rules thereunder.
